content: CARICL Observation (CARI/CL) Summary of project owner response The Report ID and Project ID has been updated in the revise MR page number | | 4, Verification team conclusion | Report ID and Project ID number have been included now. CAR-01 is closed CAR 01 MR-Cover Page: The Report ID number & Project ID number is not mentioned CAR 02 MR: The monitoring period is not mention consistently throughout the monitoring report. Please correct the anomaly The monitoring period in the MR has | been corrected to “31.03.2013 to 31.03.2015” throughout the MR. | The monitoring period is now made | as 31-March-2013 to 31-March- 2015 consistently throughout MR. CAR-02 is closed
